Package hac.ex4.repo

Class Book

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.repo.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Book extends Object implements Serializable
The class represents a book.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book()
      An empty constructor.

    • Book

      public Book(String name, String image, Integer quantity, Double price, Double discount)
      A constructor of the class that gets a various variables of the book.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the book - String.
      image - An url of the image of the book - String.
      quantity - The quantity of the book in the store stock - Integer.
      price - The full price of the book - Double.
      discount - The discount on the book price.
